details:
adjective
- converted to solid form (as concrete)
= synonyms: set
- used of persons
= example: used of persons
= synonyms: scheming
- protected against attack (especially by nuclear weapons)
= example: protected against attack (especially by nuclear weapons)
- made hard or flexible or resilient especially by heat treatment
= synonyms: tempered, treated, toughened
- made tough by habitual exposure
= example: made tough by habitual exposure
= synonyms: enured, inured
